get.description: Lists information about all Compute API versions.
Shows details for Compute API v2.

parameters.name: tenant_id
parameters.description: The tenant ID in a multi-tenancy cloud.

get.description: Lists available extensions.

            "updated": "2011-12-16T00:00:00+00:00",
            "description": "Adds actions to create cloudpipe instances.\n\n    When running with the Vlan network mode, you need a mechanism to route\n    from the public Internet to your vlans. parameters.name: tenant_id
parameters.description: The tenant ID in a multi-tenancy cloud.

parameters.name: alias
parameters.description: An alias, which is a name for a pointer to a resource. For example, a named extension.

get.description: Gets details about the specified extension.

parameters.name: tenant_id
parameters.description: The tenant ID in a multi-tenancy cloud.

get.description: Lists the current limits for the account.

parameters.name: tenant_id
parameters.description: The tenant ID in a multi-tenancy cloud.

get.description: Lists IDs, names, and links for all servers.

parameters.name: changes-since
parameters.description: A time/date stamp for when the server last changed status.

parameters.name: image
parameters.description: Name of the image in URL format.

parameters.name: flavor
parameters.description: Name of the flavor in URL format.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the server as a string; can be queried with regular expressions. Realize that ?name=bob returns both bob and bobb. If you need to match bob only, you can use a regular expression matching the syntax of the underlying database server implemented for Compute (such as MySQL or PostgreSQL).

parameters.name: marker
parameters.description: UUID of the server at which you want to set a marker.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Integer value for the limit of values to return.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Value of the status of the server so that you can filter on "ACTIVE" for example.

parameters.name: host
parameters.description: Name of the host as a string.

parameters.name: tenant_id
parameters.description: The tenant ID in a multi-tenancy cloud.

get.description: Lists details for all servers.

parameters.name: changes-since
parameters.description: A time/date stamp for when the server last changed status.

parameters.name: image
parameters.description: Name of the image in URL format.

parameters.name: flavor
parameters.description: Name of the flavor in URL format.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the server as a string; can be queried with regular expressions. Realize that ?name=bob returns both bob and bobb. If you need to match bob only, you can use a regular expression matching the syntax of the underlying database server implemented for Compute (such as MySQL or PostgreSQL).

parameters.name: marker
parameters.description: UUID of the server at which you want to set a marker.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Integer value for the limit of values to return.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Value of the status of the server so that you can filter on "ACTIVE" for example.

parameters.name: host
parameters.description: Name of the host as a string.

parameters.name: tenant_id
parameters.description: The tenant ID in a multi-tenancy cloud.

parameters.name: server_id
parameters.description: The UUID for the server.

get.description: Gets details for a specified server.

put.description: Updates the editable attributes of the specified server.

parameters.name: tenant_id
parameters.description: The tenant ID in a multi-tenancy cloud.

parameters.name: server_id
parameters.description: The UUID for the server.

get.description: Shows metadata for a specified server.

put.summary: Create or replace server metadata items
put.description: Creates or replaces metadata items for a specified server.

post.description: Updates metadata items by key for a specified server.

parameters.name: tenant_id
parameters.description: The tenant ID in a multi-tenancy cloud.

parameters.name: server_id
parameters.description: The UUID for the server.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: A string. Maximum length is 255 characters.

get.description: Shows details for a metadata item by key for a specified server.

put.summary: Create or update server metadata item
put.description: Sets a metadata item by key for a specified server.

delete.description: Deletes a metadata item by key for a specified server.

parameters.name: tenant_id
parameters.description: The tenant ID in a multi-tenancy cloud.

parameters.name: server_id
parameters.description: The UUID for the server.

get.description: Lists networks and addresses for a specified tenant and server.

parameters.name: tenant_id
parameters.description: The tenant ID in a multi-tenancy cloud.

parameters.name: server_id
parameters.description: The UUID for the server.

parameters.name: network_label
parameters.description: The network label, such as `public` or `private`.

get.description: Lists addresses for a specified tenant, server, and network.

parameters.name: tenant_id
parameters.description: The tenant ID in a multi-tenancy cloud.

parameters.name: server_id
parameters.description: The UUID for the server.

post.description: Creates a new image. Specify the `createImage` action in the request body.

parameters.name: tenant_id
parameters.description: The tenant ID in a multi-tenancy cloud.

get.description: Lists IDs, names, and links for available images.

parameters.name: changes-since
parameters.description: A time/date stamp for when the image last changed status.

parameters.name: server
parameters.description: Name of the server in URL format.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the image as a string.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Value of the status of the image so that you can filter on "ACTIVE" for example.

parameters.name: marker
parameters.description: UUID of the image at which you want to set a marker.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Integer value for the limit of values to return.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Value of the type of image, such as snapshot or backup.

parameters.name: tenant_id
parameters.description: The tenant ID in a multi-tenancy cloud.

get.description: Lists all details for available images.

get.description: Lists IDs, names, and links for available flavors.

parameters.name: minDisk
parameters.description: Integer value for the minimum disk space in GB so you can filter results.

parameters.name: minRam
parameters.description: Integer value for the minimum RAM so you can filter results.

parameters.name: marker
parameters.description: UUID of the flavor at which you want to set a marker.

parameters.description: Integer value for the limit of values to return.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Integer value for the limit of values to return.

parameters.name: flavor_id
parameters.description: UUID for the specific flavor (combination of memory, disk size, and CPUs).
